D

delta() - Method in class com.peyrona.mingle.cil.devices.Device
 
Device - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.devices
A Device can be either a sensor or an actuator.

After DEVICE is added to its controller and it has a bus to send messages to, we can init the DEVICE get.

Devices can be dynamically added and removed: this is something that has to be done carefully: adding dynamically a device does not passes all the "controls" that are passed by the transpiler; e.g.: time units can not be used: time has to be expressed in milliseconds.
DeviceBuilder - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.devices
 
Driver - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.drivers
A Driver is an intermediate between devices and Controllers.
DriverBuilder - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.drivers

removeAction(IRule.IAction) - Method in class com.peyrona.mingle.cil.rules.Rule
 
Rule - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.rules
RULE commands provide the logic to the language.
RuleBuilder - Class in com.peyrona.mingle.cil.rules
This class builds (deserializes) and Unbuild (serializes) a RULE command, with an expression as its WHEN clause and a set of IActions for its THEN clause.
